description:
Pinyari Dad
This is the Pinyari family. Dad, Mom, son and daughter - the four of them live together in this house. Today, they fight over meal time - that is their usual way of family gathering. At that time, a big monster has appeared!
Boy and Girl
On a rest day, Mom took Bunji and Fumi to a department store to buy clothes. But Bunji didn`t really care in choosing his clothes and gets excited in the toy store. 
Mom`s special move
Bunji and his friends get engrossed with their card games. They decided to make their own Moms on cards. Mom`s element is thunder, her special move is "Nagging Falling Thunder" and so on. 
Dad vs Mom
Dad and Mom are quarreling. Mom swears that she has never made a mistake and to counter that, Dad prepares a specific example but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Pinyari Dad / Boy, Girl / Special Move / Dad vs. Mom
ぴにゃりとうさん / 男のコ女のコ / おかあさんの必殺技 / とうさんVSかあさん
